statements.statement: select * from sys_region A where id=${id?c} <#--${id?string("##0.##")} -->

select * from sys_region A where 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> and (A.name like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.id like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.code like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.node_path_text like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.remark like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.value like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' ) </#if> <#if query.id??> and A.id = ${query.id} </#if> <#if query.code??> and A.code = '${query.code}' </#if> <#if query.name??> and A.name like '%${query.name}%' </#if> <#if query.nodePath??> and A.node_path like '${query.nodePath}%' </#if> <#if query.value??> and A.value like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.value)}%' </#if> <#if query.remark??> and A.remark like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.remark)}%' </#if> <#if query.appCode??> and A.app_code like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.appCode)}%' </#if>
<#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if>
<#if query.sortField?? && query.sortOrder??> order by ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortField)} ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortOrder)} <#else> order by sn </#if> </#if>
